actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Rabbi Arthur Schneier in recognition of his pioneering role in promoting religious freedom and human rights throughout the world, for close to half a century.
short_title: Rabbi Arthur Schneier Congressional Gold Medal Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text:
Rabbi Arthur Schneier Congressional Gold Medal Act

Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the presentation, on behalf of Congress, of a gold medal to Rabbi Arthur Schneier in recognition of his pioneering role in promoting religious freedom and human rights throughout the world for close to half a century.

titles.title: Rabbi Arthur Schneier Congressional Gold Medal Act
